snippet.title: Rotwood - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Rotwood has a brand new update and we've got a brand new cinematic trailer! Also, KleiFest 2024 has kicked off! Get full details here: https://klei.gg/KleiFest2024 If you're new to Rotwood, you can get it now in Early Access: https://klei.gg/RotwoodEA Upgrade your gear, choose your preferred weapon, and sharpen your skills to defend your safe haven in this rogue-like dungeon crawler developed by Klei Entertainment!  

Rotwood is about getting better, getting stronger, and taking on challenges you once thought impossible. Featuring rich and varied fighting mechanics, play solo or co-op with up to three other friends to battle your way through the Rotwood and its increasingly frenzied inhabitants. 

Surviving the Rotwood is no walk in the park. It’s going to take practice, strategy, and skill to take on the game’s most challenging encounters.

-------------------------------------------
Follow Klei Other Places!
-------------------------------------------
Twitter: https://twitter.com/klei
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kleientertainment
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kleientertainment
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kleientertainment
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/kleient
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/klei
Forums: https://forums.kleientertainment.com

#Rotwood #KleiEntertainment #gaming
